entities.name: gang

relationships.description: The gang dislikes Harry Potter, as mentioned in the text: 'gang hated that odd Harry Potter'.
Dudley's gang has an influence on others, as mentioned in the text: 'and nobody liked to disagree with Dudley’s gang'.
The gang is associated with Dudley, as mentioned in the text: 'Dudley’s gang'.
